hero.title: Learn Programming with
hero.subtitle: A leading programming academy that transforms beginners into confident developers
hero.description: Join thousands of students who changed their lives with our practical courses designed specifically for local and global job markets. From zero to professional, we're with you every step of the way.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: We are a leading programming academy that transforms beginners into confident developers through hands-on project-based learning and industry-relevant content.
about.mainTitle: Preparing the Next Generation of Programmers
about.description1: PR TEC Academy was founded in 2023 and quickly became at the forefront of programming education by providing comprehensive courses that bridge academic learning with job market requirements.
about.description2: Our mission is simple: provide high-quality programming education for everyone regardless of background or previous experience. We believe anyone can become an outstanding programmer with the right guidance and practical training.
about.description3: From children taking their first steps in programming to professionals seeking to develop their skills, we provide a supportive learning environment that encourages creativity, problem-solving, and technical excellence.

expertTrainers.title: Expert Trainers
expertTrainers.description: Learn from professionals with over 10 years of experience

smallGroups.title: Small Groups
smallGroups.description: Personal attention for each student with maximum 15 students per batch

practicalProjects.title: Practical Projects
practicalProjects.description: Build real applications and projects to add to your portfolio

flexibleSchedule.title: Flexible Schedule
flexibleSchedule.description: Evening and weekend groups to fit your schedule

latestTech.title: Latest Technologies
latestTech.description: Learn using the latest tools and technologies in the market

careerSupport.title: Career Support
careerSupport.description: Career guidance and employment support for all graduates

about.readyToStart: Ready to Start Your Programming Journey?
about.readyDescription: Join thousands of students who changed their lives with PR TEC Academy. Take the first step towards a professional career.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Us
contact.description: Ready to start your programming journey? We're here to help you choose the right course and answer all your questions. Let's talk about your tech future!
contact.contactDescription: We're always happy to help! Contact us through any of the following methods or visit us.
